CRGC_ensembldescriptiontopprevnext
sub CRGC_ensembl {
my $dbh=shift;
my ($chr,$start,$end,$org)=@_;
my $str2 = "select l.ll_id from gk_ens_chromosome g, gk_ll2ens l where (g.chromosome = '$chr') and (g.begin
>$start) and (g.end < $end) and (g.gene_stable_id=l.gene_stable_id) and (g.organism='$org')"  or print "Couldn't prepare statement: ";
my $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || print "could not prepare ens" . $dbh->errstr;
my @accn;
	$nm->execute();
	while (my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array) {
  push @accn,$accn;
 }
 return @accn;
}
CRGC_ncbidescriptiontopprevnext
sub CRGC_ncbi {
my $dbh=shift;
my ($chr,$start,$end,$org)=@_;
my $str2 = "select c.ll_id from gk_ll_chromosome c, ll_locus l where c.chromosome = '$chr' and c.begin
>$start and c.end < $end and c.ll_id=l.ll_id and l.organism='$org'"  or print "Couldn't prepare statement: ";
my $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || print "could not prepare ens" . $dbh->errstr;
$nm->execute();
my @accn;
	while (my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array ){
  push @accn,$accn;
 }
return @accn;
}
accn_to_lldescriptiontopprevnext
sub accn_to_ll {
undef my @accn;
my ($field,$table);
my $dbh=shift;
my $query = shift;
ACCN: {
  if ($query=~/^NM/) { $table='ll_refseq_nm'; $field='nm_accn'; last ACCN; }
  if ($query=~/^XM/) { $table='ll_refseq_xm'; $field='xm_accn'; last ACCN; }
  if ($query=~/^NM/) { $table='ll_refseq_nm'; $field='np_accn'; last ACCN; }
  if ($query=~/^XM/) { $table='ll_refseq_xm'; $field='xp_accn'; last ACCN; }
  $table='ll_accn'; $field='seq_accn'; last ACCN;
}
my $str2 = "select ll_id from $table where $field=?";
eval {
$nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || die $DBI::errstr; };
if ($@) { &PSKIN::reconnect; $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || die "could not prepare" . $dbh->errstr;   }
	$nm->execute($query);
	while (my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array()) {
    push @accn,$accn if (defined($accn));
  }
  my $rows=$nm->rows;
  $nm->finish;
 return $accn[0];
}
candidatesdescriptiontopprevnext
sub candidates {
my $dbh=shift;
  my ($chr,$begin,$end,$minclones,$minsize,$minfrq,$tissue,$org)=@_;
  $tissue=uc($tissue);
my @dat;
=h
my $sql="SELECT  e.FREQ, l.LL_ID, l.SYMBOL, l.GENE_NAME, c.CHROMOSOME,
c.BEGIN, c.END, t.TISSUE, t.UNIQUE_TISSUE, t.CLONES, e.freq/t.clones AS
cfreq
FROM cgap_expr  e, ll_locus  l,  cgap_lib  t, cgap_gene a, gk_ll_chromosome  c
WHERE (l.LL_ID=c.ll_id) AND (l.LL_ID=a.ll_id) AND (l.LL_ID=a.ll_id) AND
(a.LL_ID=c.ll_id) AND(c.CHROMOSOME='$chr')
AND (c.BEGIN>$begin) AND (c.END<$end) AND (e.FREQ>$minclones)
AND (UPPER(t.UNIQUE_TISSUE)='$tissue') AND (e.CGAP_LIB_ID=t.cgap_lib_id)
AND (e.freq/t.clones >$minfrq)   AND (t.CLONES>$minsize)
AND (l.organism='$org')";
=cut
my $sql="SELECT  e.FREQ, l.LL_ID, l.SYMBOL, l.GENE_NAME,
c.BEGIN, c.END, t.TISSUE, t.CLONES, e.freq/t.clones AS
cfreq
FROM cgap_expr  e, ll_locus  l,  cgap_lib  t, cgap_gene a, gk_ll_chromosome  c
WHERE (l.LL_ID=c.ll_id) AND (l.LL_ID=a.ll_id) AND (l.LL_ID=a.ll_id) AND
(a.LL_ID=c.ll_id) AND(c.CHROMOSOME='$chr')
AND (c.BEGIN>$begin) AND (c.END<$end) AND (e.FREQ>$minclones)
AND (UPPER(t.UNIQUE_TISSUE)='$tissue') AND (e.CGAP_LIB_ID=t.cgap_lib_id)
AND (e.freq/t.clones >$minfrq)   AND (t.CLONES>$minsize)
AND (l.organism='$org')  AND (e.cgap_gene_id=a.cgap_gene_id) ";
  my $q=$dbh->prepare($sql) || die "Couldn't prepare" . DBI->errstr;

$q->execute || die "Couldn't exec" . DBI->errstr;
while (my @row=$q->fetchrow_array) {
my $res=join("\t",@row);
push @dat,$res;
}
 push @dat,$sql;
return @dat;
}
chromosome_coordinatesdescriptiontopprevnext
sub chromosome_coordinates {
my $dbh=shift;
my $ll=shift;
my $cdd="select chromosome,begin from gk_ll_chromosome where ll_id=?";
my $q=$dbh->prepare($cdd) || die $DBI::errstr;
$q->execute($ll) || die  $DBI::errstr;
my @func= @{$q->fetchall_arrayref->[0]};
$q->finish;
return @func;
}
ens_transcripts_by_genedescriptiontopprevnext
sub ens_transcripts_by_gene {
my $dbh=shift;
  my $ens=shift;
  my $nm;
  my $str = "select a.transcript_id from ens_transcript a, ens_gene_stable b
   where b.ens_gene_stable_id=a.ens_gene_stable_id and b.stable_id=?";
   eval {
  $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str") ||die $DBI::errstr;};
  if ($@) { &PSKIN::reconnect; $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str") || die "could not prepare" . $dbh->errstr;   }
  	$nm->execute($ens) || die "Failed to execute!\n" . $dbh->errstr;
	return $nm->fetchall_arrayref();
}
ensembl_to_lldescriptiontopprevnext
sub ensembl_to_ll {
my @accn;
my $dbh=shift;
my @ll= @_;
my @res;
my $str2 = "select ll_id from gk_ll2ens where gene_stable_id=?" ;
eval {
$nm = $dbh->prepare($str2) ;};
foreach my $query (@ll) {
    my @accn;
	$nm->execute($query);
	while (my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array()) {
    push @accn,$accn;
  }
  push @res,\@accn;
}
  $nm->finish;
 return @res;
}
get_cogdescriptiontopprevnext
sub get_cog {
my $dbh=shift;
my $id=shift;
my $org=GKDB::getorg($id);
return undef if (!grep(/$org/,@organisms));
my $gsi=GKDB::id_to_ens($id,$org);
my @found;
push @found,$id;
my $q=$dbcomp->prepare("SELECT gene_relationship_id FROM gene_relationship_member where member_stable_id='$gsi'");
$q->execute;
while (my $id=$q->fetchrow_array) {
my $g=$dbcomp->prepare("SELECT member_stable_id FROM gene_relationship_member where gene_relationship_id='$id'");
$g->execute;
  while (my $gid=$g->fetchrow_array) {
    my $ll=GKDB::ens_to_ll($gid);
    push @found,$ll if (!grep(/\b$ll\b/,@found));
  }
$g->finish;
}
$q->finish;
return @found;
}
get_cogiddescriptiontopprevnext
sub get_cogid {
my $dbh=shift;
  my @ll=@_;
  my %res;
  my $analysish;
  eval {
   $analysish= $dbh->prepare("select ortholog_grp from hg_ortholog where ll_id=?") || die $DBI::errstr;  };
 foreach my $ll (@ll) {
  $analysish->execute($ll) || die "executing... ". $dbh->errstr;
  $res{$ll}=$analysish->fetchrow_array;
}
  $analysish->finish;
  return\% res;
}

 $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2");  };
if ($@) { &PSKIN::reconnect; $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || die "could not prepare" . $dbh->errstr;   }
	$nm->execute($query);
	my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array();
  my $rows=$nm->rows;
  $nm->finish;
 return $accn;
}
get_ens_chrdescriptiontopprevnext
sub get_ens_chr {
my $dbh=shift;
my $stable=shift;
my $h=$dbh->prepare("select chromosome, chr_build, begin, end, orient from gk_ens_chromosome where gene_stable_id='$stable'")||die 
$DBI::errstr;
$h->execute||die $DBI::errstr;
return $h->fetchrow_arrayref;
}
get_ll_iddescriptiontopprevnext
sub get_ll_id {
my $dbh=shift;
my @id=@_;
$str = "select ll_id from ll_accn where seq_accn=?";
my @res;
eval {
$sth = $dbh->prepare("$str"); };
foreach my $id (@id) {
$sth->execute($id);
my @accn;
    while ( my $res=$sth->fetchrow_array) {
        push @accn,$res;
    }
    push @res,\@accn;
}
$sth->finish;
return  @res;
}
get_lls_cogiddescriptiontopprevnext
sub get_lls_cogid {
my $dbh=shift;
  my $cog=shift;
  my %res;
  my $query = $dbh->prepare("select ll_id from hg_ortholog where ortholog_grp=? and ll_id <> ?") || die "could not prepare". $dbh->errstr;
  foreach my $ll (keys %$cog) {
	$query->execute($cog->{$ll},$ll)|| die "executing... ". $dbh->errstr;
	my @all = @{$query->fetchall_arrayref};
    my @res;
  foreach my $res (@all) {
    foreach my $row(@{$res}) {
      my ($ll1)=$row;
      $ll1=~s/\D+//g;
      push @res,$ll1 if ( !grep(/^$ll1$/,@res));
    }
  }
  $res{$ll}=\@res;
  }
$query->finish;
  return\% res;
}
get_orthdescriptiontopprevnext
sub get_orth {
  my $ll=shift;
  eval { $q=$dbh->prepare("select homolog_locusid from ll_comp_map where ll_id=$ll" ) || die "could not prepare " . $dbh->errstr . $@ . "select homolog_locusid from ll_comp_map where ll_id=$ll";};
  if ($@) {&PSKIN::reconnect; $q=$dbh->prepare("select homolog_locusid from ll_comp_map where ll_id=$ll" ) || die "could not prepare " . $dbh->errstr . $@; };
 $q->execute || die "could not exec " . $dbh->errstr;
  return $q->fetchrow_array;
  $q->finish;
}
getensembl(1)descriptiontopprevnext
sub getensembl(1) {
my $dbh=shift;
my $query = shift;
my $str2 = "select gene_stable_id from gk_ll2ens where ll_id=?" ;
eval {
 $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") ||die $DBI::errstr;};
if ($@) { &PSKIN::reconnect; $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || die "could not prepare" . $dbh->errstr;   }
	$nm->execute($query) || warn "Failed to execute!\n" . $dbh->errstr;
	my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array();
   $accn=&getfromhash('ensembl',$query,'ll') unless ($accn);
  $nm->finish;
 return $accn;
}

sub getensembl(2) {
my @accn;
my $dbh=shift;
my @ll= @_;
my @res;
my $str2 = "select gene_stable_id from gk_ll2ens where ll_id=?"  ;
eval {
$nm = $dbh->prepare($str2) ;};
foreach my $query (@ll) {
    my @accn;
	$nm->execute($query);
	while (my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array()) {
    push @accn,$accn;
  }
  push @res,\@accn;
}
  $nm->finish;
 return @res;
}
getfromhashdescriptiontopprevnext
sub getfromhash {
my ($target,$query)=@_;
my %source=%{$input{mapdata}};
VARNI: {
  if ($target eq 'll') { return $source{$query}->[0]; }
  if ($target eq 'sym') {  return $source{$query}->[1]; }
  if ($target eq 'nm') {  return [$source{$query}->[2]]; }
  if ($target eq 'org') {  return $source{$query}->[3]; }
  if ($target eq 'ensembl') {  $source{$query}->[4]; }
}
}

gi_to_lldescriptiontopprevnext
sub gi_to_ll {
my $dbh=shift;
undef my @accn;
my $query = shift;
my $str2 = "select distinct ll_id from ll_accn where seq_gid=?" ;
eval { $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") ;};
if ($@) { &PSKIN::reconnect; $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || die "could not prepare" . $dbh->errstr;   }
	$nm->execute($query);
	while (my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array()) {
    push @accn,$accn;
  }
    @accn=&getfromhash('ll',$query,'nm') unless ($accn[0]);
  $nm->finish;
 return $accn[0];
}
go_to_lldescriptiontopprevnext
sub go_to_ll {
my $dbh=shift;
my $query = shift;
my $str2 = "select ll_id from ll_go where go_id=?"  or die "Couldn't prepare statement: " . $dbh->errstr;
my $go = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || die "could not prepare\n";
	print $query,"\n";
	$go->execute($query);
my @ret;
	while (my $llid = $go->fetchrow_array) {
          push (@ret,$llid) ;
	}
$go->finish;
 return @ret;
}

ll_to_accndescriptiontopprevnext
sub ll_to_accn {
my $dbh=shift;
my $id=shift;
$str = "select seq_accn from ll_accn where ll_id=?";
eval {
$sth = $dbh->prepare("$str"); };
if ($@) { &PSKIN::reconnect; $sth = $dbh->prepare("$str") || die "could not prepare" . $dbh->errstr;   }
$sth->execute("$id");
my $res=$sth->fetchrow_array;
$sth->finish;
return  @{$res};
}
ll_to_godescriptiontopprevnext
sub ll_to_go {
my $dbh=shift;
my @ret;
my @ll=@_;
$str2 = "select go_id from ll_go where ll_id=?";
my $go = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || die "could not prepare\n";
foreach  my $query (@ll) {
	$go->execute($query);
	while (my $llid = $go->fetchrow_array) {
          push @ret,$llid;
	}
    push @res,\@ret;
}
$go->finish;
 return @res;
}
ll_to_probe_setdescriptiontopprevnext
sub ll_to_probe_set {
  my ($dbh,$ll,$table)=@_;
my $str2 = "select probe_set_id from gotm_affy_$table where ll_id='$ll'";
eval {
 $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2");  };
if ($@) { &PSKIN::reconnect; $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || die "could not prepare" . $dbh->errstr;   }
	$nm->execute();
	my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array();
  my $rows=$nm->rows;
  $nm->finish;
 return $accn;
}
ll_to_swissdescriptiontopprevnext
sub ll_to_swiss {
my $dbh=shift;
my $id=shift;
$str = "select sprot_id from gk_ll2sprot where ll_id=?";
eval {
$sth = $dbh->prepare("$str"); };
if ($@) { &PSKIN::reconnect; $sth = $dbh->prepare("$str") || die "could not prepare" . $dbh->errstr;   }
$sth->execute("$id");
my $res=$sth->fetchrow_array;
$sth->finish;
return $res;
}
ll_to_symdescriptiontopprevnext
sub ll_to_sym {
my $dbh=shift;
my $query = shift;
my @lls;
my $str2 = "select symbol from ll_locus where ll_id=?";
eval {
 $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2");  };
if ($@) { &PSKIN::reconnect; $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || die "could not prepare" . $dbh->errstr;   }
	$nm->execute($query);
 my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array();
   $accn=&getfromhash('sym',$query,'ll') unless ($accn);
   $nm->finish;
   return $accn;
}
nm_to_lldescriptiontopprevnext
sub nm_to_ll {
my @accn;
my $dbh=shift;
my @ll= @_;
my @res;
my $str2 = "select distinct ll_id from ll_refseq_nm where nm_accn=?" ;
eval {
$nm = $dbh->prepare($str2) ;};
foreach my $query (@ll) {
    my @accn;
	$nm->execute($query);
	while (my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array()) {
    push @accn,$accn;
  }
  push @res,\@accn;
}
  $nm->finish;
 return @res;
}
np_to_lldescriptiontopprevnext
sub np_to_ll {
undef my @accn;
my $query = shift;
my $str2 = "select distinct ll_id from ll_refseq_nm where np_accn=?" ;
eval { $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") ;};
if ($@) { &PSKIN::reconnect; $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || die "could not prepare" . $dbh->errstr;   }
	$nm->execute($query);
	while (my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array()) {
    push @accn,$accn;
  }
    @accn=&getfromhash('ll',$query,'np') unless ($accn[0]);
  $nm->finish;
 return $accn[0];
}
probe_set_to_lldescriptiontopprevnext
sub probe_set_to_ll {
  my ($dbh,$probeID,$table)=@_;
my $str2 = "select ll_id from gotm_affy_$table where probe_set_id='$probeID'";
eval {
 $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2");  };
if ($@) { &PSKIN::reconnect; $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || die "could not prepare" . $dbh->errstr;   }
	$nm->execute();
	my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array();
  my $rows=$nm->rows;
  $nm->finish;
 return $accn;
}
sprot_to_lldescriptiontopprevnext
sub sprot_to_ll {
my $dbh=shift;
my $id=shift;
$str = "select ll_id from gk_ll2sprot where sprot_id=?";
eval {
$sth = $dbh->prepare("$str"); };
if ($@) { &PSKIN::reconnect; $sth = $dbh->prepare("$str") || die "could not prepare" . $dbh->errstr;   }
$sth->execute("$id");
my $res=$sth->fetchrow_array;
$sth->finish;
return $res;
}
sym_to_lldescriptiontopprevnext
sub sym_to_ll {
my $dbh=shift;
my $query = shift;
my @lls;
my $str2 = "select ll_id from ll_locus where upper(symbol)=?";
eval {
 $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2");  };
if ($@) { &PSKIN::reconnect; $nm = $dbh->prepare("$str2") || die "could not prepare" . $dbh->errstr;   }
	$nm->execute($query);
 while (my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array()) {
  push @lls,$accn;
 }
   @lls=&getfromhash('ll',$query,'sym') unless (@lls);
  my $rows=$nm->rows;
  $nm->finish;
 return @lls;
}
